brainly_data.question:
In what areas do we still see the influences of early Greek culture?
a.) science and mathematics
b.) arts and architecture
c.) philosophy
d.) all of these areas
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question:
In what areas do we still see the influences of early Greek culture?
a.) science and mathematics
b.) arts and architecture
c.) philosophy
d.) all of these areas
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: I'd say D would be the correct answer, considering that all of the things listed are still influenced by early greek culture, especially philosophy, architecture, and math
